```{r}
library(Lahman)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
data(Salaries)
data(Batting)
data(People)

People %>% data.frame()
Batting %>% data.frame()
People %>% data.frame()
```

```{r}
df <- full_join(People,Batting, by = 'playerID')
df <- full_join(df, Salaries, by = 'playerID')
df <- df %>% na.omit()
```
